original_text:
All at once he followed her
    like an ox going to the slaughter,
like a deer stepping into a noose
korean_text: 젊은이가 곧 그를 따랐으니 소가 도수장으로 가는 것 같고 미련한 자가 벌을 받으려고 쇠사슬에 매이러 가는 것과 같도다

sentences.original_text: All at once he followed her
like an ox going to the slaughter
like a deer stepping into a noose
